named-query.name: Customer.findByLastNameAndCity
named-query.query: select c from Customer c where c.lastName = ?1 and c.address.city = ?2

named-query.name: Customer.findByAddressCity
named-query.query: select c from Customer c where c.address.city = ?1

named-query.name: Customer.findByAddress
named-query.query: select c from Customer c where c.address = ?1
